summary:
This is my very first mod, so don't expect to be impressed.
Adds a Khajiit vampire hunter to the Riften Fishery, and doesn't require DG! :D
(In loving memory of Winky, the psychic calico cat)
descriptionHtml:
So it was a wonderful day, birds crashing into my windows, and I had an idea. I would make a Khajiit who would follow me to the ends of the earth, and be super effective against vampires, because I had been infected 12 times.


Ta-da!


Okay.
(Probably not lore-friendly because I didn't look up any lore stuffs)
(In loving memory of Winky, the psychic calico cat)
author: Munothecat
